title: Pizza Lounge
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, American, Pizza, Italian, Beer/Wine, Delivery, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Local pizzeria offering pizza pies, salads, sandwiches, and drinks in a lounge setting. Along with traditional pizza toppings are vegan-friendly choices including vegan mozzarella, vegan chipotle monterey jack blend, vegan Mexican chipotle sausage, soyrizo, and tofurky. Dough is vegan suitable. Laid back atmosphere & hangout.
